categories: Category:Plants of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: Monotropa Triflora was an extremely rare parasitic plant capable of growing in total darkness on the planet Dromund Kaas. Often mistaken for a fungus, Monotropa Triflora possessed root systems that intertwined with nearby trees and fungus and thus allowed the plant to feed off other plants' nutrients as well as occasionally absorb properties of other plants. One variety contained a powerful opiate-like property potent enough to numb skin on contact.
